item.title: AI Ball Path Prediction Modeling Within Pong Clone
item.description: Overall Goal To develop a more intelligent, efficient and ‘human like’ Predictive Opponent AI. Background Information The current Simple Opponent AI in both the Classic and Advanced game modes ‘cheats’ in that it knows where the ball is located at all times, much like a human player does with their eyesight, yet in contrast can move perfectly as needed every time so as to never miss, unlike humans’ inevitable mistakes, limited reaction and manual keyboard input times.
